name: The Last Guardian - LD42
description:
You are a wizard protecting a secret hidden area deep in the woods, but it has been discovered by the dark forces. They are spawning dark portals to enter the hidden area, you have to escape to survive. You can teleport out in a a couple minutes, but can you survive until then?

Controls:
-LMB: Shoot fireball to kill monsters
-RMB: Use beam of light to destroy the portals.
-Your character will aim at your mouse pointer.

Casting fireballs drains fire energy, you gain fire energy from using the light beam on the portals. Using the light beam drains light energy, you gain it from picking up the light objects that spawns at the purple flowers.
